ISSUE.TITLE: Remove django-storages hard dependecy
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: An application user should be able to use this app without requiring to save to S3. He can simply use https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.7/ref/files/storage/ . We should add a `SILVER_DOCUMENT_PREFIX` setting to prepend to the upload callable and `SILVER_DOCUMENT_STORAGE` for specifying the storage backend.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Updated package requirements * Added xhtml2pdf and django-xhtml2pdf to setup.py (fixes #113) * Removed boto and django-storages from requirements/common.txt (#114)
